related_questions.question:
33. Rearrange these sentences into a good paragraph!    (1) Jack had an accident a few days ago
(2) Jill went to the Hospital to visit him
(3) He is still in the hospital now
(4) She is at hospital now
(5) He had to go to the hospital​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

(1),(5),(3),(2),(4)

Penjelasan:

1.jack mengalami kecelakaan beberapa hari yang lalu

5.dia harus pergi ke RS

3.dia(laki laki) masih di rumah sakit sekarang

2.jill pergi ke RS untuk mengunjunginya(laki laki)

4.dia(perempuan) di RS sekarang

related_questions.question: Contoh percakapan 5 orang tentang borrowing a book the library

answers.answer:
andi : hi guys , how are you ? , have you guys prepared for tomorrow’s lesson

marsya : hi andi , we’re good , what lesson?

andi : it’s english lesson mr. thomas will be teaching us tomorrow but i lost my book

sari : “ oh my god i forgot tomorrow will be the most important lesson , if we dont bring the book mr. thomas will get mad at us “

tono : “ guys relaxx .. we have library in our school “

joey : “ yeah .. that’s right you guys no need to worry mrs . milla will help us to find the book “

andi : “ thank god , i thought our school doesn’t provide us that kind of book we wanted “

marsya : “ well ... let’s go to library then before its close “

andi : “ alright “

related_questions.question:
Text for questions number 21 - 23.    I am an SMP student. My name is Randi. I have
one sister and two brothers. My sister's name is Tasya
and my brothers' names are Bimo and Zaky. My father's
name is Bambang and my mother's name is Alya. I live
with my family at 7 Batu Sangkar Street.
I am twelve years old. Tasya is ten years old. Bimo
is six years old. Zaky is three years old. My father is
fourty three and my mother is fourty. We are good
family
21. Randi's sister is ..... years old.
b. 6
a. 3
c. 10
d. 12
Ut?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

21. Randy's sister is..... years old

c.10

Penjelasan:

Semoga membantu!

Jawaban:

Pantun adalah salah satu puisi lama yang baris pertama kedua merupakan sampiran dan baris ketiga keempat yaitu isi, mempunyai 4 baris, Setiap barisnya mempunyai 8-12 Kosakata (cara menghitungnya dengan cara dipenggal seperti, ayah: a-yah)

Jawaban:

she didn't learn to swim yesterday.

Penjelasan:

hope you find this helpful^•^

related_questions.question:

b. Report text
d. Recount text

a.
To amuse
c. To promote
b. To report
d. To describe

17. Generic Structure
a. Identification
c. Events
b. Description d. Evaluation

18. Retell the experience of the writer in past time
a. Personal Recount c. Fiction recount
b. Factual Recount d. Imaginative Recount

bantu jwab ya​

17.Events

18.Personal Recount

related_questions.question:
43. Answer the questions    Dear Johnathan
Please don't forget to pick up our son at 12 o'clock at his school. And also on forget to take his fou
lunch, he would love to have some spaghetti and ice cream
With love, Plumary
a. Who is receive the short message?
b. Who is sending the short message?
c. What must Johnathan do?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A.Johnathan

B.Plumary

C.Pick up his son at 12 o'clock dan give his lunch to him

Jawaban:

a. Plumary's husband

b. Plumary is sending the short message

c. He must pick up their son at 12 o'clock at his school

Penjelasan:

Moga berguna
